Name: Harvard cocktail #2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Byrrh combines well with cognac in this variation on the classic Harvard .
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Tony Conigliaro at 69 Colebrooke Row , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Harvard cocktail #2 contains 134 calories
